about.p: The office of Alumni and External Relations (AER) is mandated with facilitating interaction and engaging with the Instituteâ€™s alumni and to encourage and develop academic, industrial and research collaborations.

As the Nodal Office for handling interactions with external organizations and institutions, the AER office handles requests for MoUs with other universities and institutions. The AER office also handles all matters related to admission of foreign students, visas and engaging with various embassies and diplomatic missions.
